trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示音訊輸入也就是相關聯<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器產生的音訊輸入有關辨識作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的可辨識的音訊，請使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>方法的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 下列事件和方法可產生辨識結果<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別:-事件:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-方法:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > A 辨識模擬的語音辨識所產生的結果不包含可辨識的音訊。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這類的辨識結果，其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>屬性會傳回`null`及其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>方法會擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關模擬的語音辨識的詳細資訊，請參閱`EmulateRecognize`和`EmulateRecognizeAsync`方法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>類別。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸入的音訊資料流中的位置開始的可辨識音訊。

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會參考開頭位置的已辨識片語的輸入的裝置產生的音訊資料流中。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，`RecognizerAudioPosition`屬性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>類別參考其音訊的輸入中的辨識器的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 這些位置可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用語音辨識事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>屬性會取得系統時間的辨識作業開頭。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 可辨識音訊中開始輸入音訊資料流的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 取得可辨識音訊輸入音訊資料流的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 持續時間輸入音訊資料流中的可辨識音訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 取得辨識引擎處理的音訊格式。

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 語音辨識器所處理的音訊格式。

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 選取並傳回一段目前辨識音訊為二進位資料。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 音訊資料要傳回的起點。

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的區段長度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: 依照所定義，傳回的子區段的可辨識音訊 audioPosition 和 duration 。

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPosition和duration定義目前區段的範圍之外的音訊的區段。

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: 目前辨識音訊未包含任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得系統時間的辨識作業開頭。

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: StartTime 屬性會取得系統時間辨識作業，這會很有用的延遲和效能計算的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>屬性會取得輸入的裝置產生的音訊資料流中的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 系統在辨識作業開始時間。

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: 做為原始資料寫入資料流的整個音訊。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: 音訊資料寫入至`outputStream`二進位格式。

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: 標頭不未包含任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: WriteToAudioStream 方法使用 Wave 格式，但不包含 Wave 標頭。

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含 Wave 標頭，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 將接收音訊資料流。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Wave 格式的資料流中寫入音訊。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: 音訊資料寫入至`outputStream`Wave 格式，包括資源交換檔案格式 (RIFF) 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>方法會使用相同的二進位格式，但不包含 Wave 標頭。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 將接收音訊資料流。
